entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a StringBuilder equivalent of String.Create #63176
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for Ed25519 #63174
  • ICustomMarshaler tests seems incomplete #63172
  • Support more than one jsoncontext in aspnet core #63171
  • Help - Using compiled library DLLs directly instead of nupkg errors out at compile time #63169
  • [MacCatalyst] System.Xml.XmlSerializer.Tests timed out #63168
  • [WASM][Browser] DebuggerTests.ArrayTests: EXECUTION TIMED OUT #63167
  • Logging properly handles arrays, but not within tuples #63165
  • [API Proposal]: Simple, modern TCP APIs #63162
  • How to get the socket information from HttpClient request? #63159
  • BigInteger may stack overflow when converting to a string with custom format providers #63158

Closed

  • TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset.TotalMinutes is wrong for "Morocco Standard Time". Expected: 60; Actual: 0. #63164
  • [Arm64] Use stp (SIMD) in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #48934
    Future
  • Opportunities to improve TE Platform-Plaintext benchmark #63059
  • TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset.TotalMinutes is wrong for "Morocco Standard Time". Expected: 60; Actual: 0. #63170
  • surapolservice #63161
  • why Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json use SortedDictionary? #40697
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix _il suffix for _d/_r-variant ilproj tests #63178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Switch to objwriter from the dotnet/llvm-project repo #63177
    * NO MERGE *, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Increase timeout for debugger tests on CI #63173

Merged

  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove unneeded ifdefs #63160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify build mode for one previously missed form _opt_dbg / _opt_rel #63175
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use shared strings for Array:Copy exception messages #63163
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/tailcall tests and make them mergeable #63031
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve auto-formatting of ref/System.Runtime #63139
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1528579 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • Superpmi.py: Detect changes in jiteeversionguid.h #63000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
